text: "Shades" is the debut single by American singer-songwriter Alexandra Savior. It was released on June 17, 2016 via Columbia Records as the first single from Belladonna of Sadness. ==Personnel== * Alexandra Savior – lead vocals * Alex Turner – guitars, bass, keyboards, synthesizers * James Ford – keyboards, synthesizers, drums, percussion ==References== Category:2016 songs Category:Alexandra Savior songs Category:Songs written by Alex Turner (musician) Category:Columbia Records singles Category:Song recordings produced by James Ford (musician) Category:Songs written by Alexandra Savior
title: Shades (Alexandra Savior song)
